r.s: An extension to track progress of a file upload.
r.d: See http://svn.php.net/viewvc/pecl/uploadprogress/trunk/examples/ for a little example. It is only known to work on Apache with mod_php, other SAPI implementations unfortunately still have issues. At least PHP 5.2 is needed.
r.n: - Another make it work with PHP 5.4
